column5: Need a little help here, any information on the lakes in the duck mountain area in Manitoba would be helpful. Primary interest would be for walleye, pike and musky. Going in mid june. How are the bugs that time of year too? Thanks for anyone help in advance

not usually a destination for those species only 1 lake may still have some stocked muskies walleyes in wellman pike in a few more pike walleyes you are better off driving down to lake of the prairies for the day....best drive to fishing around that area ducks is known here for the trout fishing really no worthwhile musky lakes in manitoba very nice area for camping and hiking manitoba .... a 100,000 lakes how many walleyes ???? i will never have enough time....
